body.p: This page is generated by Machine Translation from Japanese.

section.name: Overview
section.p: Job performed results appear as a list.

subsection.name: How to display
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click menu users.

subsection.name: List joblog
subsection.p: Lists the job run log. You can determine the job name, status, start and finish times. You can also select more information, to check the details of each log.

subsection.name: Job log details
subsection.p: You can check job log contents. Job name, status, start and completion time, displays the results, such as.
